title: EYL #185 The Business of the Oscars, Hollywood, & The Movie Industry
itunes:title: EYL #185 The Business of the Oscars, Hollywood, & The Movie Industry
description:
We sat down with the Executive Vice President of The Academy, Shawn Finnie for a powerful conversation about Hollywood, Black Hollywood, careers in the movie industry, the process of producing an award show and more. #oscars #hollywood #theacademy 

EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com

Link for InvestFest: https://investfest.com/
